text: (tāṉiyam vāṅkiya) avarkaḷ tam tantaiyiṭam tirumpi vanta poḻutu ‘‘eṅkaḷ tantaiyē! (Puṉyāmīṉaiyum nāṅkaḷ aḻaittuc cellāviṭṭāl) eṅkaḷukku(t tāṉiyam) aḷappatu taṭukkappaṭṭuviṭum. Ātalāl, eṅkaḷ cakōtaraṉaiyum eṅkaḷuṭaṉ aṉuppivaippīrāka. Nāṅkaḷ tāṉiyam vāṅkik koṇṭu niccayamāka avaraiyum pātukāttu varuvōm'' eṉṟu kūṟiṉārkaḷ
